plot: A love-drama conflict about a young man of high social standing who falls in love with a circus girl and meets strong parental opposition. Played at the 'Teatro Campoamor' in New York City in March of 1935.
title: Payasadas de la vida
plot_es: A love-drama conflict about a young man of high social standing who falls in love with a circus girl and meets strong parental opposition. Played at the 'Teatro Campoamor' in New York City in March of 1935.
plot_en: A love-drama conflict about a young man of high social standing who falls in love with a circus girl and meets strong parental opposition. Played at the 'Teatro Campoamor' in New York City in March of 1935.

cast.role: Enrique Fernandi o Kiko el payaso
cast.name: Manuel Medel
